column2: As a staff, I will help customer to take their order by using this system.
column14: This story allow staffs to take order for their customer. Order can be taken either dine-in or take away. Staff will select the food or beverages order from the system. After that, staffs will confirm the order's made by the customer and proceed to payment.
column24: Select quantity of items to add to  Cart

column2: As a staff, I need to be able to manage customer memberships
As a manager, I would like to manage my staff
As a staff, I will update the menu from time to time.
column20: Update new item into the menu
column22: Remove unavailable item from the menu

column2: Staff can login to system using ID and password
As a customer, I would like to use my points to redeem items
As a staff, I would like to manage redeemable items
As a customer,I would like to make payment with either cash or debit/credit card
column14: This story allow customer to pay their payment through cash or debit card.
